name: Karn, the Great Creator
oracle_text: Activated abilities of artifacts your opponents control can't be activated.
+1: Until your next turn, up to one target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.
−2: You may choose an artifact card you own from outside the game or in exile, reveal that card, and put it into your hand.

name: Ugin, the Ineffable
oracle_text: Colorless spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.
+1: Exile the top card of your library face down and look at it. Create a 2/2 colorless Spirit creature token. When that token leaves the battlefield, put the exiled card into your hand.
−3: Destroy target permanent that's one or more colors.

name: Ugin's Conjurant
oracle_text: Ugin's Conjurant enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Ugin's Conjurant while it has a +1/+1 counter on it, prevent that damage and remove that many +1/+1 counters from Ugin's Conjurant.

name: Ajani's Pridemate
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.
flavor_text: Planeswalkers conjured replicas of old allies, reminders of the homeworlds that would fall next if Bolas prevailed.

name: Battlefield Promotion
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains first strike until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "Welcome to the Legion. You saved a district—now let's go save the world."

name: Bond of Discipline
oracle_text: Tap all creatures your opponents control. Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: "We agree that order benefits everyone, but not until you enforce it."

name: Bulwark Giant
oracle_text: When Bulwark Giant enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
flavor_text: "Where did she come from? More importantly, are there more like her?" —Gideon Jura

name: Charmed Stray
oracle_text: Lifelink
When Charmed Stray enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control named Charmed Stray.
flavor_text:
"There's something peculiar about the cats today."
—Janoc, Tin Street tinker

name: Defiant Strike
oracle_text: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "My family was saved thanks to a single Boros soldier. It's why I joined the Legion. I will be the protector now."

name: Divine Arrow
oracle_text: Divine Arrow deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: Ravnica's defenders watched in horror as Oketra's shot pierced the body of the pegasus. Gideon tumbled through the air, Blackblade in hand.

name: Enforcer Griffin
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text:
"A company of infantry is trapped behind the lines. We need to strike hard and fast to free them, or the casualties will be horrific. Send the griffins."
—Tajic

name: Finale of Glory
oracle_text: Create X 2/2 white Soldier creature tokens with vigilance. If X is 10 or more, also create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance.
flavor_text: The sky boiled over the citadel, dire and dark. Then the angels brought the dawn.

name: Gideon Blackblade
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Gideon Blackblade is a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Gideon Blackblade during your turn.
+1: Up to one other target creature you control gains your choice of vigilance, lifelink, or indestructible until end of turn.
−6: Exile target nonland permanent.

name: Gideon's Sacrifice
oracle_text: Choose a creature or planeswalker you control. All damage that would be dealt this turn to you and permanents you control is dealt to the chosen permanent instead (if it's still on the battlefield).
flavor_text: To Liliana's surprise, the cost of betraying Bolas did not fall on her.

name: Gideon's Triumph
oracle_text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature that attacked or blocked this turn. If you control a Gideon planeswalker, that player sacrifices two of those creatures instead.
flavor_text: His triumph came not from victory over his enemies, but from the salvation of those who survived.

name: God-Eternal Oketra
oracle_text: Double strike
Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 4/4 black Zombie Warrior creature token with vigilance.
When God-Eternal Oketra dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

name: Grateful Apparition
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Grateful Apparition deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

name: Ignite the Beacon
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two planeswalker cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"If you can't save yourself, you fight to give someone else a chance."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Ironclad Krovod
flavor_text:
"We need to block the exits from the plaza! What's big, heavy, and available?"
—Gideon Jura

name: Law-Rune Enforcer
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Tap target creature with converted mana cost 2 or greater.
flavor_text:
"See that no one enters or leaves New Prahv today. And notify me at once of any Planeswalker activity."
—Dovin Baan

name: Loxodon Sergeant
oracle_text: Vigilance
When Loxodon Sergeant enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain vigilance until end of turn.
flavor_text: His voice is both war horn and rallying cry, a trumpeting call that stirs even the faintest heart.

name: Makeshift Battalion
oracle_text: Whenever Makeshift Battalion and at least two other creatures attack, put a +1/+1 counter on Makeshift Battalion.
flavor_text: Their ranks are thin, their formation is improvised, their weapons are borrowed, and you'd best get out of their way.

name: Martyr for the Cause
oracle_text: When Martyr for the Cause dies, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text: "If I am to die in service, there is no more worthy fight than this."

name: Parhelion II
oracle_text: Flying, first strike, vigilance
Whenever Parhelion II attacks, create two 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying and vigilance that are attacking.
Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: Pouncing Lynx
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Pouncing Lynx has first strike.
flavor_text: "I don't understand. He's normally so well behaved!"

name: Prison Realm
oracle_text: When Prison Realm enters the battlefield, exile target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls until Prison Realm leaves the battlefield.
When Prison Realm enters the battlefield, scry 1.
flavor_text: After millennia to craft victory, Bolas had eternity to contemplate defeat.

name: Rally of Wings
oracle_text: Untap all creatures you control. Creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Even the clouds became a field of battle. Known as the Sky Theater, it saw the Eternals clash with squadrons of angels.

name: Ravnica at War
oracle_text: Exile all multicolored permanents.
flavor_text: The heart of Ravnica disappeared before anyone could strike a blow in its defense.

name: Rising Populace
oracle_text: Whenever another creature or planeswalker you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Rising Populace.
flavor_text: Grief is a crucible where resolve is tempered.

name: Single Combat
oracle_text: Each player chooses a creature or planeswalker they control, then sacrifices the rest. Players can't cast creature or planeswalker spells until the end of your next turn.
flavor_text:
Not even a threat to the entire Multiverse
could persuade them to put aside their feud.

name: Sunblade Angel
oracle_text: Flying, first strike, vigilance, lifelink
flavor_text: At Feather's command, squadrons of battle angels swarmed out of the Parhelion II, unsheathing blades made of molten dawn.

name: Teyo, the Shieldmage
oracle_text: You have hexproof. (You can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
−2: Create a 0/3 white Wall creature token with defender.

name: Teyo's Lightshield
oracle_text: When Teyo's Lightshield enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: Teyo gifted his shields to as many allies as possible, knowing he could not always be there to protect them himself.

name: Tomik, Distinguished Advokist
oracle_text: Flying
Lands on the battlefield and land cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.
Your opponents can't play land cards from graveyards.
flavor_text: "Some bend the law. I tie it into knots."

name: Topple the Statue
oracle_text: Tap target permanent. If it's an artifact, destroy it.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Bolas cared little when his statue fell, thinking it a useful distraction, underestimating the surge of resolve it gave his opponents.

name: Trusted Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Trusted Pegasus attacks, target attacking creature without flying gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Would you give your life to save this world?" Gideon murmured. The pegasus snorted and spread wide its mighty wings.

name: The Wanderer
oracle_text: Prevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to you and other permanents you control.
−2: Exile target creature with power 4 or greater.

name: Wanderer's Strike
oracle_text: Exile target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text:
"Precise, clean cuts. No one saw anything. Again. Tag the report with my code and file it."
—Lavinia

name: War Screecher
oracle_text: Flying
{5}{W}, {T}: Other creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Soaring over Vitu-Ghazi, New Prahv, and Orzhova, the Conclave's trained falcons provided critical intelligence.

name: Ashiok's Skulker
oracle_text: {3}{U}: Ashiok's Skulker can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"Fear writhes and whispers in the shadows of your mind. It is the enemy you always knew would come."
—Ashiok

name: Augur of Bolas
oracle_text: When Augur of Bolas enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
flavor_text: "There is no future save the one my master wills."

name: Aven Eternal
oracle_text: Flying
When Aven Eternal enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text:
"I've never seen the firemane angels so anxious."
—Tajic

name: Bond of Insight
oracle_text: Each player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard. Return up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Bond of Insight.
flavor_text: "Together we can unlock secrets no one has even dreamed of. I might even let you remember some of them."

name: Callous Dismissal
oracle_text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text:
"They make it clear we are nothing to them."
—Lavinia

name: Commence the Endgame
oracle_text: This spell can't be countered.

Draw two cards, then amass X, where X is the number of cards in your hand. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text:
"Even gods shall kneel."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Contentious Plan
oracle_text: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Niv-Mizzet had perfected a plan, but he had no control over the mortal minds who had to agree to implement it.

name: Crush Dissent
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text:
"All I ask is complete obedience."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Erratic Visionary
oracle_text: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: An Izzet experiment begins with a "what if," gets approved with a "why not," and concludes with a "eureka!"

name: Eternal Skylord
oracle_text: When Eternal Skylord enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have flying.

name: Fblthp, the Lost
oracle_text: When Fblthp, the Lost enters the battlefield, draw a card. If it entered from your library or was cast from your library, draw two cards instead.
When Fblthp becomes the target of a spell, shuffle Fblthp into its owner's library.

name: Finale of Revelation
oracle_text: Draw X cards. If X is 10 or more, instead shuffle your graveyard into your library, draw X cards, untap up to five lands, and you have no maximum hand size for the rest of the game.
Exile Finale of Revelation.
flavor_text: Ugin saw the gem that connected Bolas to his Meditation Realm as the key to his brother's downfall.

name: Flux Channeler
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text: "Inform our allies in the Tenth and throw the circuit. It's about to get weird."

name: God-Eternal Kefnet
oracle_text: Flying
You may reveal the first card you draw each turn as you draw it. Whenever you reveal an instant or sorcery card this way, copy that card and you may cast the copy. That copy costs {2} less to cast.
When God-Eternal Kefnet dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

name: Jace, Wielder of Mysteries
oracle_text: If you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead.
+1: Target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard. Draw a card.
−8: Draw seven cards. Then if your library has no cards in it, you win the game.

name: Jace's Triumph
oracle_text: Draw two cards. If you control a Jace planeswalker, draw three cards instead.
flavor_text: His triumph was not in outsmarting Bolas's plan, but in understanding why ultimate power is self-defeating.

name: Kasmina, Enigmatic Mentor
oracle_text: Spells your opponents cast that target a creature or planeswalker you control cost {2} more to cast.
−2: Create a 2/2 blue Wizard creature token. Draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Kasmina's Transmutation
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and has base power and toughness 1/1.
flavor_text:
"Hop away now, little Eternal. Go eat some flies."
—Kasmina

name: Kiora's Dambreaker
oracle_text: When Kiora's Dambreaker enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text:
"When your enemy flees, send the sea to pursue them."
—Kiora

name: Lazotep Plating
oracle_text: Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
You and permanents you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

name: Naga Eternal
flavor_text:
"I recognize that headdress. This one was feared even by her fellow initiates."
—Samut

name: Narset, Parter of Veils
oracle_text: Each opponent can't draw more than one card each turn.
−2: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a noncreature, nonland card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Narset's Reversal
oracle_text: Copy target instant or sorcery spell, then return it to its owner's hand. You may choose new targets for the copy.
flavor_text:
"In the disarray of battle, an enemy's attack may be your most convenient weapon."
—Narset

name: No Escape
oracle_text: Counter target creature or planeswalker spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
Scry 1.
flavor_text: Jace surmised that they were walking into Bolas's trap. He felt no joy in being right.

name: Relentless Advance
oracle_text: Amass 3. (Put three +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text: They approach in formation, every movement efficient and sure. They halt, listen, and then press on in silent unison.

name: Rescuer Sphinx
oracle_text: Flying
As Rescuer Sphinx enters the battlefield, you may return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Rescuer Sphinx enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: "Now, little fighter, show me you deserved this second chance."

name: Silent Submersible
oracle_text: Whenever Silent Submersible deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, draw a card.
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: Sky Theater Strix
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Sky Theater Strix gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Courier owls joined the fray, attacking the Dreadhorde with a viciousness usually reserved for mail thieves.

name: Spark Double
oracle_text: You may have Spark Double enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature or planeswalker you control, except it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it if it's a creature, it enters with an additional loyalty counter on it if it's a planeswalker, and it isn't legendary if that permanent is legendary.

name: Spellkeeper Weird
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Spellkeeper Weird: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: They worked well as a team, but they knew it couldn't last forever.

name: Stealth Mission
oracle_text: Put two +1/+1 counters on target creature you control. That creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text:
"What they don't know will definitely hurt them."
—Lazav

name: Tamiyo's Epiphany
oracle_text: Scry 4, then draw two cards.
flavor_text: Tamiyo wished only to observe the war, but she soon realized neutrality was not an option.

name: Teferi's Time Twist
oracle_text: Exile target permanent you control. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. If it enters the battlefield as a creature, it enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text: "The safest place for you is not now."

name: Thunder Drake
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Thunder Drake.
flavor_text: The arrival of the Planar Bridge caused eddies in the aether, creating some entirely new species while transforming others.

name: Totally Lost
oracle_text: Put target nonland permanent on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: At least this was better than that week at the Juri Revue.

name: Wall of Runes
oracle_text: Defender
When Wall of Runes enters the battlefield, scry 1.
flavor_text:
"It's strangely satisfying seeing an undead killing machine from another world standing befuddled in front of a wall of text."
—Lavinia

name: Aid the Fallen
oracle_text: Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "I never liked you. Now get up—we have a fight to finish."

name: Banehound
oracle_text: Lifelink, haste
flavor_text:
"I wish I could train a pack of them for hunting in the undercity. But I'd never dare turn my back, and I hate to think what I'd have to feed them."
—Zhosmir, urban huntmaster

name: Bleeding Edge
oracle_text: Up to one target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

name: Bolas's Citadel
oracle_text: You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play the top card of your library. If you cast a spell this way, pay life equal to its converted mana cost rather than pay its mana cost.
{T}, Sacrifice ten nonland permanents: Each opponent loses 10 life.

name: Bond of Revival
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until your next turn.
flavor_text: "Today we throw off the yoke of death. Either this is an affirmation of the eternal cyclical nature of life, or it's just hilarious—depends on which of us you ask."

name: Charity Extractor
oracle_text: Lifelink
flavor_text: "War or no war, your donations are due, as always."

name: Command the Dreadhorde
oracle_text: Choose any number of target creature and/or planeswalker cards in graveyards. Command the Dreadhorde deals damage to you equal to the total converted mana cost of those cards. Put them onto the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text: Liliana seized the reins of Bolas's vast army, gritting her teeth behind the Chain Veil.

name: Davriel, Rogue Shadowmage
oracle_text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, if that player has one or fewer cards in hand, Davriel, Rogue Shadowmage deals 2 damage to them.
−1: Target player discards a card.

name: Davriel's Shadowfugue
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards and loses 2 life.
flavor_text: Shadows coiled around the witness's mind. Then the moment vanished, leaving only the sting of its loss.

name: Deliver Unto Evil
oracle_text: Choose up to four target cards in your graveyard. If you control a Bolas planeswalker, return those cards to your hand. Otherwise, an opponent chooses two of them. Leave the chosen cards in your graveyard and put the rest into your hand.
Exile Deliver Unto Evil.

name: Dreadhorde Invasion
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Whenever a Zombie token you control with power 6 or greater attacks, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

name: Dreadmalkin
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{2}{B}, Sacrifice another creature or planeswalker: Put two +1/+1 counters on Dreadmalkin.
flavor_text: The feline Eternal felt Liliana's command, looked at her disdainfully, flicked its paw, and scampered away across the rooftops.

name: Duskmantle Operative
oracle_text: Duskmantle Operative can't be blocked by creatures with power 4 or greater.
flavor_text:
Gideon eyed the Dimir emissary warily. "Could your agents slip inside Bolas's citadel?"
The figure met his gaze with icy resolve. "We already have."

name: The Elderspell
oracle_text: Destroy any number of target planeswalkers. Choose a planeswalker you control. Put two loyalty counters on it for each planeswalker destroyed this way.
flavor_text: The path to power is often paved with atrocities.

name: Eternal Taskmaster
oracle_text: Eternal Taskmaster enters the battlefield tapped.
Whenever Eternal Taskmaster attacks, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text:
"They are called Eternals. They will never stop."
—Jace Beleren

name: Finale of Eternity
oracle_text: Destroy up to three target creatures with toughness X or less. If X is 10 or more, return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: When you rule by fear, your greatest weakness is one who's no longer afraid.

name: God-Eternal Bontu
oracle_text: Menace
When God-Eternal Bontu enters the battlefield, sacrifice any number of other permanents, then draw that many cards.
When God-Eternal Bontu dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

name: Herald of the Dreadhorde
oracle_text: When Herald of the Dreadhorde dies, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text: Amonkhet's dead flowed into a new world in service to their God-Pharaoh.

name: Kaya's Ghostform
oracle_text: Enchant creature or planeswalker you control
When enchanted permanent dies or is put into exile, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text: The Eternals found some sparks to be quite slippery.

name: Lazotep Behemoth
flavor_text:
"I know I should be more concerned. But a big, blue zombie-potamus from beyond the stars? This is what they're invading us with?"
—Mileva, Boros legionnaire

name: Lazotep Reaver
oracle_text: When Lazotep Reaver enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text: Despite their many forms, the Eternals worked in chilling harmony, unburdened by instinct or emotion.

name: Liliana, Dreadhorde General
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card.
+1: Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
−4: Each player sacrifices two creatures.
−9: Each opponent chooses a permanent they control of each permanent type and sacrifices the rest.

name: Liliana's Triumph
oracle_text: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a Liliana planeswalker, each opponent also discards a card.
flavor_text: Her triumph came not from escaping her death, but in claiming her independence.

name: Massacre Girl
oracle_text: Menace
When Massacre Girl enters the battlefield, each other creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Whenever a creature dies this turn, each creature other than Massacre Girl gets -1/-1 until end of turn.

name: Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted
oracle_text: Whenever an opponent draws a card, Ob Nixilis, the Hate-Twisted deals 1 damage to that player.
−2: Destroy target creature. Its controller draws two cards.

name: Ob Nixilis's Cruelty
oracle_text: Target creature gets -5/-5 until end of turn. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor_text: Trapped on Ravnica with no affection for either side, Ob Nixilis sought gratification in random acts of torment.

name: Price of Betrayal
oracle_text: Remove up to five counters from target artifact, creature, planeswalker, or opponent.
flavor_text: The moment Liliana defied Nicol Bolas, her contract was broken, and her life was forfeit. But she was free to choose her fate, and she decided it was worth the price.

name: Shriekdiver
oracle_text: Flying
{1}: Shriekdiver gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"It's faster than we are. Draw its attention while the Ledev take aim!"
—Shauntal, Boros legionnaire

name: Sorin's Thirst
oracle_text: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"I see you're out of the wall."
—Nahiri

name: Spark Harvest
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or pay {3}{B}.
Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
flavor_text: With the harvest of Domri's spark, the Elderspell began to fuel Bolas's ascension to godhood.

name: Spark Reaper
oracle_text: {3}, Sacrifice a creature or planeswalker: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
flavor_text:
"I know they're unstoppable fighters created to harvest souls—it's just they're so rude about it."
—Kaya

name: Tithebearer Giant
oracle_text: When Tithebearer Giant enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
flavor_text:
"I've always said full war chests win wars, but I didn't mean by bashing enemy skulls with them."
—Teysa

name: Toll of the Invasion
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

name: Unlikely Aid
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and  effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text:
"No one will ever ride me again, Gideon. Expect no further favors."
—Rakdos

name: Vampire Opportunist
oracle_text: {6}{B}: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "I think I cracked a fang."

name: Vizier of the Scorpion
oracle_text: When Vizier of the Scorpion enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have deathtouch.
flavor_text: His blessing is a curse.

name: Vraska's Finisher
oracle_text: When Vraska's Finisher enters the battlefield, destroy target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls that was dealt damage this turn.
flavor_text: "You might have pleaded your case with my queen earlier. Now I am here, and it is far too late."

name: Ahn-Crop Invader
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, Ahn-Crop Invader has first strike.
{1}, Sacrifice another creature: Ahn-Crop Invader gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Give me a crew like this one and I'd rule any sea I sailed."
—Angrath

name: Blindblast
oracle_text: Blindblast deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Peril is in the eye of the beholder. At least, if your aim is good."
—Jaya Ballard

name: Bolt Bend
oracle_text: This spell costs {3} less to cast if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.
Change the target of target spell or ability with a single target.
flavor_text:
"Give them everything you've got . . . and some things you don't."
—Ral Zarek

name: Bond of Passion
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Bond of Passion deals 2 damage to any other target.
flavor_text: "Why don't we fight for what's right and let bureaucrats argue over details?"

name: Burning Prophet
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Burning Prophet gets +1/+0 until end of turn, then scry 1.
flavor_text: "This day will end in death, but not the one you hoped for. This day will end in victory, but not the one you expected."

name: Chainwhip Cyclops
oracle_text: {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavor_text:
"You say this Tenth District, not Rubblebelt. But where smash happen, that Rubblebelt. Rubblebelt state of mind."
—Urgdar, cyclops philosopher

name: Chandra, Fire Artisan
oracle_text: Whenever one or more loyalty counters are removed from Chandra, Fire Artisan, she deals that much damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
+1: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.
−7: Exile the top seven cards of your library. You may play them this turn.

name: Chandra's Pyrohelix
oracle_text: Chandra's Pyrohelix deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.
flavor_text:
"Now that I've dealt with your little toys, I can focus on the real problem: you."
—Chandra Nalaar, to Dovin Baan

name: Chandra's Triumph
oracle_text: Chandra's Triumph deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls. Chandra's Triumph deals 5 damage to that permanent instead if you control a Chandra planeswalker.
flavor_text: Her triumph came not from achieving her ideal self, but from rejecting the idea of perfection.

name: Cyclops Electromancer
oracle_text: When Cyclops Electromancer enters the battlefield, it deals X damage to target creature an opponent controls, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: Every storm has an eye.

name: Demolish
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or land.
flavor_text:
"For every inch of land they take from us, we take it back or we burn it. Give them nothing."
—Aurelia

name: Devouring Hellion
oracle_text: As Devouring Hellion enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures and/or planeswalkers. If you do, it enters with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor_text: There's no crisis a hellion can't make worse.

name: Dreadhorde Arcanist
oracle_text: Trample

Whenever Dreadhorde Arcanist attacks, you may cast target instant or sorcery card with converted mana cost less than or equal to Dreadhorde Arcanist's power from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

name: Dreadhorde Twins
oracle_text: When Dreadhorde Twins enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have trample.

name: Finale of Promise
oracle_text: You may cast up to one target instant card and/or up to one target sorcery card from your graveyard each with converted mana cost X or less without paying their mana costs. If a card cast this way would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead. If X is 10 or more, copy each of those spells twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.

name: Goblin Assailant
flavor_text: What he lacks in patience, intelligence, empathy, lucidity, hygiene, ability to follow orders, self-regard, and discernible skills, he makes up for in sheer chaotic violence.

name: Goblin Assault Team
oracle_text: Haste
When Goblin Assault Team dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
flavor_text: Under the veneer of the various guilds, each goblin has the same basic need: to run screaming at the enemy and hit a bunch of stuff.

name: Grim Initiate
oracle_text: First strike
When Grim Initiate dies, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text: Beneath each gleaming mineral shell rots a once-proud warrior of Amonkhet.

name: Heartfire
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or planeswalker.
Heartfire deals 4 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The mage looked within and realized there was still one piece of fuel to burn.

name: Honor the God-Pharaoh
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards. Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text: In life, they revered a diverse pantheon of gods. Now they revere only the God-Pharaoh.

name: Ilharg, the Raze-Boar
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Ilharg, the Raze-Boar attacks, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. Return that creature to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.
When Ilharg, the Raze-Boar dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

name: Invading Manticore
oracle_text: When Invading Manticore enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text:
"Fall back! You are no match for this."
—Samut

name: Jaya, Venerated Firemage
oracle_text: If another red source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals that much damage plus 1 to that permanent or player instead.
−2: Jaya, Venerated Firemage deals 2 damage to any target.

name: Jaya's Greeting
oracle_text: Jaya's Greeting deals 3 damage to target creature. Scry 1.
flavor_text: "We have visitors? Well, it'd be rude not to give them a traditional Keral Keep welcome."

name: Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin
oracle_text: Whenever Krenko, Tin Street Kingpin attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then create a number of 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens equal to Krenko's power.
flavor_text: "After the people flee, but before the enemy arrives—that's grabbin' time."

name: Mizzium Tank
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Mizzium Tank becomes an artifact creature and gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

name: Nahiri's Stoneblades
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The ancient Planeswalkers Sorin and Nahiri battled across Ravnica, their blows cutting as deep as their grudge.

name: Neheb, Dreadhorde Champion
oracle_text: Trample

Whenever Neheb, Dreadhorde Champion deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, you may discard any number of cards. If you do, draw that many cards and add that much {R}. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

name: Raging Kronch
oracle_text: Raging Kronch can't attack alone.
flavor_text:
"Seeing so much easy prey makes her crazy. See how she snorts and drools?"
—Dhuuz, kronch wrangler

name: Samut's Sprint
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.
flavor_text: Samut's war was intensely personal. Every hour she faced enemies she once loved as friends and horrors she once revered as gods.

name: Sarkhan the Masterless
oracle_text: Whenever a creature attacks you or a planeswalker you control, each Dragon you control deals 1 damage to that creature.
+1: Until end of turn, each planeswalker you control becomes a 4/4 red Dragon creature and gains flying.
−3: Create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

name: Sarkhan's Catharsis
oracle_text: Sarkhan's Catharsis deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: "You once brought havoc to my home and ruined my mind. I'm here to return the favor, Bolas."

name: Spellgorger Weird
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Spellgorger Weird.
flavor_text: Freed from their respective labs, the two weirds formed a partnership, feeding on the arcane energies of war.

name: Tibalt, Rakish Instigator
oracle_text: Your opponents can't gain life.
−2: Create a 1/1 red Devil creature token with "When this creature dies, it deals 1 damage to any target."

name: Tibalt's Rager
oracle_text: When Tibalt's Rager dies, it deals 1 damage to any target.
{1}{R}: Tibalt's Rager gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Find out whose that is. I like its energy."
—Judith

name: Turret Ogre
oracle_text: Reach
When Turret Ogre enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, Turret Ogre deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavor_text: Common Gruul career aspirations: berserker, shaman, catapult.

name: Arboreal Grazer
oracle_text: Reach
When Arboreal Grazer enters the battlefield, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"We fight to stop a tyrant, but we also fight for the gentle creatures who have no concept of what befalls their world."
—Vivien Reid

name: Arlinn, Voice of the Pack
oracle_text: Each creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
−2: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

name: Arlinn's Wolf
oracle_text: Arlinn's Wolf can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
flavor_text:
"If you don't speak Wolf, allow me to translate: ‘One step closer and I'll rip out your throat.'"
—Arlinn Kord

name: Awakening of Vitu-Ghazi
oracle_text: Put nine +1/+1 counters on target land you control. It becomes a legendary 0/0 Elemental creature with haste named Vitu-Ghazi. It's still a land.
flavor_text: The Eternal armies advanced on Vitu-Ghazi. At Nissa's command, Vitu-Ghazi advanced on them.

name: Band Together
oracle_text: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.
flavor_text: In times of peril, the vision the ancient paruns had for their city comes into focus.

name: Bloom Hulk
oracle_text: When Bloom Hulk enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text:
"Tread upon these flower beds at your own peril."
—Emmara

name: Bond of Flourishing
oracle_text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a permanent card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: "We agree that life should flourish. We disagree on the optimal number of limbs."

name: Centaur Nurturer
oracle_text: When Centaur Nurturer enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "I call upon the vigor of the grasses, the hopes of the flowers, and the dreams of the trees."

name: Challenger Troll
oracle_text: Each creature you control with power 4 or greater can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text: For most, war is a calamity. For some, an opportunity. And for the very few, a pleasure.

name: Courage in Crisis
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature, then proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text: "Thanks to my father, I know how to fight. He also showed me why I must."

name: Evolution Sage
oracle_text: Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text: "To care for yourself, cultivate the world. To care for the world, cultivate yourself."

name: Finale of Devastation
oracle_text: Search your library and/or graveyard for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. If you search your library this way, shuffle it. If X is 10 or more, creatures you control get +X/+X and gain haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: Some spells sing a quiet tune. Others roar.

name: Forced Landing
oracle_text: Put target creature with flying on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor_text: The druid knew only one spell, a charm to encourage rapid plant growth. When airborne Eternals invaded her arboretum, she had to get creative.

name: Giant Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Sometimes Mowu is content to gnaw on a bone. Sometimes he wants the whole skeleton."
—Jiang Yanggu

name: God-Eternal Rhonas
oracle_text: Deathtouch
When God-Eternal Rhonas enters the battlefield, double the power of each other creature you control until end of turn. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
When God-Eternal Rhonas dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

name: Jiang Yanggu, Wildcrafter
oracle_text: Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
−1: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

name: Kraul Stinger
oracle_text: Deathtouch
flavor_text: He listens to the sounds of battle filtering down from above, waiting for silence, waiting for his time to claim the streets.

name: Kronch Wrangler
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Kronch Wrangler.
flavor_text: Looking over two city blocks of destruction, he could only cackle with pride.

name: Mowu, Loyal Companion
oracle_text: Trample, vigilance
If one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on Mowu, Loyal Companion, that many plus one +1/+1 counters are put on it instead.
flavor_text: Wherever Yanggu goes, Mowu follows—sometimes at his side, sometimes obscuring him from view entirely.

name: New Horizons
oracle_text: Enchant land
When New Horizons enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

name: Nissa, Who Shakes the World
oracle_text: Whenever you tap a Forest for mana, add an additional {G}.
+1: Put three +1/+1 counters on up to one target noncreature land you control. Untap it. It becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with vigilance and haste that's still a land.
−8: You get an emblem with "Lands you control have indestructible." Search your library for any number of Forest cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

name: Nissa's Triumph
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic Forest cards. If you control a Nissa planeswalker, instead search your library for up to three land cards. Reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Her triumph came not from destroying the unnatural, but from fostering life.

name: Paradise Druid
oracle_text: Paradise Druid has hexproof as long as it's untapped.(It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "There are many kinds of duty, and mine is to see our world grow and endure."

name: Planewide Celebration
oracle_text: Choose four. You may choose the same mode more than once.
• Create a 2/2 Citizen creature token that's all colors.
• Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Proliferate.
• You gain 4 life.

name: Pollenbright Druid
oracle_text: When Pollenbright Druid enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
• Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

name: Primordial Wurm
flavor_text: Elite training, single-minded devotion, and lazotep coating help only so much for invaders who are fundamentally bite-sized.

name: Return to Nature
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Yes, nature is stronger. You don't see little buildings sprouting on trees."
—Emmara

name: Snarespinner
oracle_text: Reach
Whenever Snarespinner blocks a creature with flying, Snarespinner gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Let's lure the drakes to the webs over the Samok Stand. Keep the spiders content."
—Aurelia

name: Steady Aim
oracle_text: Untap target creature. It gets +1/+4 and gains reach until end of turn.
flavor_text: The archer's heart broke seeing her compatriots die far below, but she held position until the enemy was in range.

name: Storm the Citadel
oracle_text: Until end of turn, creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, destroy target artifact or enchantment defending player controls."
flavor_text:
"If we die, we die. But we cannot let him win."
—Ajani Goldmane

name: Thundering Ceratok
oracle_text: Trample
When Thundering Ceratok enters the battlefield, other creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"I thought this was a civilized plane. How are there so many feral beasts?"
—Dovin Baan

name: Vivien, Champion of the Wilds
oracle_text: You may cast creature spells as though they had flash.
+1: Until your next turn, up to one target creature gains vigilance and reach.

−2: Look at the top three cards of your library. Exile one face down and put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. For as long as it remains exiled, you may look at that card and you may cast it if it's a creature card.

name: Vivien's Arkbow
oracle_text: {X}, {T}, Discard a card: Look at the top X cards of your library. You may put a creature card with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Vivien's Grizzly
oracle_text: {3}{G}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature or planeswalker card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don't put the card into your hand, put it on the bottom of your library.

name: Wardscale Crocodile
oracle_text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text:
"The Eternals had to endure Amonkhet's five trials. Let's see if they can pass the Trial of Ravnica."
—Jace Beleren

name: Ajani, the Greathearted
oracle_text: Creatures you control have vigilance.
+1: You gain 3 life.
−2: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and a loyalty counter on each other planeswalker you control.

name: Angrath's Rampage
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Target player sacrifices an artifact.
• Target player sacrifices a creature.
• Target player sacrifices a planeswalker.
flavor_text: "Grand city? No. This is nothing but another squalid cage."

name: Bioessence Hydra
oracle_text: Trample
Bioessence Hydra enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each loyalty counter on planeswalkers you control.
Whenever one or more loyalty counters are put on planeswalkers you control, put that many +1/+1 counters on Bioessence Hydra.

name: Casualties of War
oracle_text: Choose one or more —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target creature.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Destroy target land.
• Destroy target planeswalker.

name: Cruel Celebrant
oracle_text: Whenever Cruel Celebrant or another creature or planeswalker you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "Whichever side wins, I'm sure the banquet will be superb."

name: Deathsprout
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"They say nothing lasts forever. I say everything lasts forever, just not in the form you may be accustomed to."
—Vraska

name: Despark
oracle_text: Exile target permanent with converted mana cost 4 or greater.
flavor_text: Liliana whispered to whatever consciousness Oketra and Bontu had left. "You are the gods. He is the usurper. You know what to do."

name: Domri, Anarch of Bolas
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+0.
+1: Add {R} or {G}. Creature spells you cast this turn can't be countered.
−2: Target creature you control fights target creature you don't control.

name: Domri's Ambush
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
flavor_text: "When civilization teeters on the brink, I'll be there to kick it the rest of the way."

name: Dovin's Veto
oracle_text: This spell can't be countered.
Counter target noncreature spell.
flavor_text: "I see you've learned nothing, Chandra. You'd still put a match to something rather than understand it."

name: Dreadhorde Butcher
oracle_text: Haste
Whenever Dreadhorde Butcher deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on Dreadhorde Butcher.
When Dreadhorde Butcher dies, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

name: Elite Guardmage
oracle_text: Flying
When Elite Guardmage enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life and draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Be careful. You'll have more than Dovin to contend with if you hope to breach New Prahv."
—Lavinia, to Chandra Nalaar

name: Enter the God-Eternals
oracle_text: Enter the God-Eternals deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain life equal to the damage dealt this way. Target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard. Amass 4. (Put four +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

name: Feather, the Redeemed
oracle_text: Flying

Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets a creature you control, exile that card instead of putting it into your graveyard as it resolves. If you do, return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Gleaming Overseer
oracle_text: When Gleaming Overseer enters the battlefield, amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have hexproof and menace.

name: Heartwarming Redemption
oracle_text: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards plus one. You gain life equal to the number of cards in your hand.
flavor_text: Kytheon had known war every day of his life. Now he finally knew peace.

name: Huatli's Raptor
oracle_text: Vigilance
When Huatli's Raptor enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text: The essence of Ixalan was never far from Huatli's heart.

name: Invade the City
oracle_text: Amass X, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavor_text: Death greeted the world with a roar of desert air.

name: Leyline Prowler
oracle_text: Deathtouch, lifelink
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: It feeds on the dark energies that course through the deep world—and on any other creature lured by the leyline's pull.

name: Living Twister
oracle_text: {1}{R}, Discard a land card: Living Twister deals 2 damage to any target.
{G}: Return a tapped land you control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"The ancient places of Ravnica awaken, stirred by the hoofbeats of Ilharg!"
—Nikya of the Old Ways

name: Mayhem Devil
oracle_text: Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, Mayhem Devil deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Despite their stake in the city's survival, Rakdos cultists are loath to pass up any opportunity to sow chaos.

name: Merfolk Skydiver
oracle_text: Flying
When Merfolk Skydiver enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
{3}{G}{U}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

name: Neoform
oracle_text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.

Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost, put that card onto the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it, then shuffle your library.

name: Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God
oracle_text: Nicol Bolas, Dragon-God has all loyalty abilities of all other planeswalkers on the battlefield.
+1: You draw a card. Each opponent exiles a card from their hand or a permanent they control.
−3: Destroy target creature or planeswalker.
−8: Each opponent who doesn't control a legendary creature or planeswalker loses the game.

name: Niv-Mizzet Reborn
oracle_text: Flying

When Niv-Mizzet Reborn enters the battlefield, reveal the top ten cards of your library. For each color pair, choose a card that's exactly those colors from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Oath of Kaya
oracle_text: When Oath of Kaya enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
Whenever an opponent attacks a planeswalker you control with one or more creatures, Oath of Kaya deals 2 damage to that player and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: "So everyone gets what they truly deserve, I will keep watch."

name: Pledge of Unity
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. You gain 1 life for each creature you control.
flavor_text:
"No one hero will save this day. Today we must all be heroes."
—Gideon Jura

name: Ral, Storm Conduit
oracle_text: Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, Ral, Storm Conduit deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
+2: Scry 1.
−2: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell this turn, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

name: Ral's Outburst
oracle_text: Ral's Outburst deals 3 damage to any target. Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Time to find the melting point of lazotep."
—Ral Zarek

name: Roalesk, Apex Hybrid
oracle_text: Flying, trample
When Roalesk, Apex Hybrid enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control.
When Roalesk dies, proliferate, then proliferate again. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there. Then do it again.)

name: Role Reversal
oracle_text: Exchange control of two target permanents that share a permanent type.
flavor_text: Uthlon the Wise scandalized sphinx society, hooting the answers to riddles as he rampaged through Tin Street. Grangle, on the other hand, sat for hours, deep in thought, largely ignored by fellow goblins.

name: Rubblebelt Rioters
oracle_text: Haste
Whenever Rubblebelt Rioters attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the greatest power among creatures you control.
flavor_text:
"If the system is broken, break the system."
—Domri Rade

name: Solar Blaze
oracle_text: Each creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
flavor_text:
"The primary weapon is nothing more than light. It shows them what they are, and they burn of their own accord."
—Aurelia

name: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, creatures and planeswalkers you control have lifelink.
+2: Sorin, Vengeful Bloodlord deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
−X: Return target creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield. That creature is a Vampire in addition to its other types.

name: Soul Diviner
oracle_text: {T}, Remove a counter from an artifact, creature, land, or planeswalker you control: Draw a card.
flavor_text: As the Eternal's cold fingers tightened around his throat, Domri realized what kind of master he had rushed to serve.

name: Storrev, Devkarin Lich
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever Storrev, Devkarin Lich deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, return to your hand target creature or planeswalker card in your graveyard that wasn't put there this combat.
flavor_text: In times of war, only death flourishes.

name: Tamiyo, Collector of Tales
oracle_text: Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to discard cards or sacrifice permanents.
+1: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top four cards of your library. Put all cards with the chosen name from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
−3: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Teferi, Time Raveler
oracle_text: Each opponent can cast spells only any time they could cast a sorcery.
+1: Until your next turn, you may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash.
−3: Return up to one target artifact, creature, or enchantment to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

name: Tenth District Legionnaire
oracle_text: Haste
Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tenth District Legionnaire, put a +1/+1 counter on Tenth District Legionnaire, then scry 1.
flavor_text:
"The Tenth is under heavy attack, but it's being handled. I sent Mileva."
—Tajic

name: Time Wipe
oracle_text: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.
flavor_text:
"To comprehend the full answer requires years of temporal study. In short, they were now never born in the first place."
—Teferi

name: Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves
oracle_text: When Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves enters the battlefield, create Voja, Friend to Elves, a legendary 3/3 green and white Wolf creature token.
Whenever a Wolf enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 3 life and that creature fights up to one target creature you don't control.

name: Tyrant's Scorn
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less.
• Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text:
"The hero with the magic sword slays the dragon? Not this time."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Widespread Brutality
oracle_text: Amass 2, then the Army you amassed deals damage equal to its power to each non-Army creature. (To amass 2, put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

name: Angrath, Captain of Chaos
oracle_text: Creatures you control have menace.
−2: Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

name: Ashiok, Dream Render
oracle_text: Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause their controller to search their library.
−1: Target player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard. Then exile each opponent's graveyard.

name: Dovin, Hand of Control
oracle_text: Artifact, instant, and sorcery spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast.
−1: Until your next turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt to and dealt by target permanent an opponent controls.

name: Huatli, the Sun's Heart
oracle_text: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power.
−3: You gain life equal to the greatest toughness among creatures you control.

name: Kaya, Bane of the Dead
oracle_text: Your opponents and permanents your opponents control with hexproof can be the targets of spells and abilities you control as though they didn't have hexproof.
−3: Exile target creature.

name: Kiora, Behemoth Beckoner
oracle_text: Whenever a creature with power 4 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
−1: Untap target permanent.

name: Nahiri, Storm of Stone
oracle_text: As long as it's your turn, creatures you control have first strike and equip abilities you activate cost {1} less to activate.
−X: Nahiri, Storm of Stone deals X damage to target tapped creature.

name: Saheeli, Sublime Artificer
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.
−2: Target artifact you control becomes a copy of another target artifact or creature you control until end of turn, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

name: Samut, Tyrant Smasher
oracle_text: Creatures you control have haste.
−1: Target creature gets +2/+1 and gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1.

name: Vraska, Swarm's Eminence
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control with deathtouch deals damage to a player or planeswalker, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
−2: Create a 1/1 black Assassin creature token with deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals damage to a planeswalker, destroy that planeswalker."

name: Firemind Vessel
oracle_text: Firemind Vessel enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add two mana of different colors.
flavor_text: The city mourned Niv-Mizzet's death, but he left behind the components for his rebirth.

name: God-Pharaoh's Statue
oracle_text: Spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast.
At the beginning of your end step, each opponent loses 1 life.
flavor_text: A dictator's infuriating smirk, an affront to everything Ravnica stood for.

name: Guild Globe
oracle_text: When Guild Globe enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Guild Globe: Add two mana of different colors.
flavor_text:
"Hopefully Ravnica will prove harder to break."
—Karn

name: Iron Bully
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
When Iron Bully enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
flavor_text:
"Why would someone have built . . . wait, never mind. Send it to the front lines!"
—Commander Grozdan

name: Mana Geode
oracle_text: When Mana Geode enters the battlefield, scry 1.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"I don't care if it's an all-powerful relic or a street vendor's lucky charm. If it brings you courage, wear it."
—Saheeli Rai

name: Prismite
oracle_text: {2}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: It didn't budge when the portal opened, nor when the ancient gods emerged. It came to life only when all ten guilds came together to face a common threat.

name: Saheeli's Silverwing
oracle_text: Flying
When Saheeli's Silverwing enters the battlefield, look at the top card of target opponent's library.
flavor_text: "Track the source of those thopters," Saheeli told her creation. "And feel free to snack on as many as you want."

name: Blast Zone
oracle_text: Blast Zone enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it.
{T}: Add {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}: Put X charge counters on Blast Zone.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Blast Zone: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Blast Zone.

name: Emergence Zone
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Emergence Zone: You may cast spells this turn as though they had flash.
flavor_text: The Planar Bridge opened over the Chamber of the Guildpact, reducing the symbol of Ravnica's endurance to rubble.

name: Gateway Plaza
oracle_text: Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield tapped.
When Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: Guild leaders focused their magic on the portal scar. Where the Chamber perished, a parun could be reborn.

name: Interplanar Beacon
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a planeswalker spell, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add two mana of different colors. Spend this mana only to cast planeswalker spells.

name: Karn's Bastion
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.
{4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text:
"I can't protect everyone here. But those I can, I will."
—Karn

name: Mobilized District
oracle_text: {T}: Add {C}.

{4}: Mobilized District becomes a 3/3 Citizen creature with vigilance until end of turn. It's still a land. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each legendary creature and planeswalker you control.
flavor_text: Sometimes the strongest weapon you can hold in your hand is another hand.

name: Gideon, the Oathsworn
oracle_text: Whenever you attack with two or more non-Gideon creatures, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures.

+2: Until end of turn, Gideon, the Oathsworn becomes a 5/5 white Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn. (He can't attack if he was cast this turn.)
−9: Exile Gideon, the Oathsworn and each creature your opponents control.

name: Desperate Lunge
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains flying until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: Ravnica held its breath as the hero of the resistance—their last hope—flew through the sky, his dark sword ready to strike a god.

name: Gideon's Battle Cry
oracle_text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Gideon, the Oathsworn, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.
flavor_text: "Break their formation! Thin their ranks! I'm right behind you!"

name: Gideon's Company
oracle_text: Whenever you gain life, put two +1/+1 counters on Gideon's Company.
{3}{W}: Put a loyalty counter on target Gideon planeswalker.
flavor_text: "For the Legion! For Ravnica!"

name: Orzhov Guildgate
oracle_text: Orzhov Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
flavor_text:
"So much wealth. So much splendor. So much temptation to believe the gilded lie."
—Kaya

name: Jace, Arcane Strategist
oracle_text: Whenever you draw your second card each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.
+1: Draw a card.
−7: Creatures you control can't be blocked this turn.

name: Guildpact Informant
oracle_text: Flying
Whenever Guildpact Informant deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavor_text: "Of course you're being followed!"

name: Jace's Projection
oracle_text: Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Jace's Projection.
{3}{U}: Put a loyalty counter on target Jace planeswalker.
flavor_text: "Pardon me if I seem distracted. Part of me is reconnoitering the Tenth District."

name: Jace's Ruse
oracle_text: Return up to two target creatures to their owner's hand. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Jace, Arcane Strategist, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.
flavor_text: "The Eternals can recognize faces. They just think I look like a blue minotaur."

name: Simic Guildgate
oracle_text: Simic Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.
flavor_text:
"Mystery is beauty. Within the unknown we plumb revelation."
—Vannifar

name: Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge
oracle_text: Creature and planeswalker spells you cast have affinity for artifacts. (They cost {1} less to cast for each artifact you control.)
+2: Tezzeret, Master of the Bridge deals X damage to each opponent, where X is the number of artifacts you control. You gain X life.
−3: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.
−8: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Put all artifact cards from among them onto the battlefield.
